column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I would call the food
column2: mediocre.  Something for everyone.  Nothing hit me to the point where I was like
column3: "Man I gotta eat that again!"  Don't get me wrong
column4: food was fine.  Just nothing really popped out.  The drinks however were great.  Their mojitos were refreshing!  I would not come back on my own
column5: but if a friend wanted to come here
